Package hevs.gdx2d.components.audio

Contains the classes required to play music with gdx2d

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    MusicPlayer
    A class to stream music without loading it within gdx2d.
    SoundSample
    A class to play short samples within gdx2d.
